seng202.crimeSpy.crimeData

Class OR_Map

  • java.lang.Object
    • seng202.crimeSpy.crimeData.OR_Map

  • public class OR_Map
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides a 1:1 mapping of a CrimeRecord object into a structure that can be passes into the DAL (data access layer) for easy writing and vice versa.

    Example Use: OR_Map cr = new OR_Map(myCrimeRecord);
    String sql = "INSERT INTO CRIME_RECORD (CRIME_RECORD_ID ... other column headings";
    sql += "VALUES ('"
    sql += cr.getCaseID() + "'";

    Current schema Maps Available
    • Chicago type CrimeRecord - OR_Map

    • Constructor Detail

      • OR_Map

        public OR_Map(CrimeRecord cr)
        For a Chicago type CrimeRecord. Object to relationObject map.
        Type conversion is performed by this class for SQLliteDB

        Object will have:

        • ID
        • Date
        • Arrest
        • Domestic
        • Previous Crime ID
        • Next Crime ID
        • ICUR number
        • FBI CD number
        • Primary Description (type)
        • Secondary Description (type)
        • Block
        • Beat
        • Ward
        • x Coordinate
        • y Coordinate
        • Latitude
        • Longitude
        • (Latitude, Longitude)
        • Location Description
        Parameters:
        cr - the crime record for which to create an OR_Map
